---
category: news
title: "BBC R&D investigates how machine learning can colourise video"
excerpt: "The team at BBC Research & Development have been working on a project looking at how machine learning can help colourise archive black and white video. In a blog post, the team reveal they are working on researching how to colourise black and white images using other colour images with similar content to guide the colourisation process."
